attributes.action: Debate the steps required to protect mental health and safety at work.
attributes.additional_details:
To reduce the mental suffering to those at work.

To reduce the enormous cost to the economy (£35 billion pa, not including NHS costs) of workplace mental injury.
attributes.background:
Whereas workplace physical injuries have been in decline over a long period, mental injury statistics are showing no improvement. 

I would like to see two things:

1. The H&SE should be mandated to be more interventionist.

2. Additional legislation needs to be enacted.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what new legislation you want to be brought forward. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
